title: Teen charged in North Shore shooting
author: Ross Cristantiello
bullets: Local News The 14-year-old suspect was arraigned this week in connection with a shooting that occurred near Simon Street in Beverly.

The teen was arraigned Tuesday in Salem Juvenile Court.

title: Trump threatens to ‘take away’ World Cup games scheduled for Boston area
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Sports News The president said Tuesday he would consider moving the seven World Cup games scheduled for the Boston area elsewhere.
President Donald Trump said Tuesday he would consider moving the World Cup games scheduled for the Boston area elsewhere due to "unsafe conditions.

" Jacquelyn Martin/AP Photo In response to a recent string of so-called street takeovers, President Donald Trump said Tuesday that he could “take away” the 2026 World Cup games scheduled to be held in the Boston area.
